title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Shaking things up can rattle someones cage today. Perhaps you tell a joke or story with an unexpected ending, hoping to break through to someone youre trying to reach. Or you use a completely different mode of communication, like offering a handwritten apology rather than spilling your guts with a deluge of texts. The element of surprise works well in any competition, but just as well in love, friendship, or business. Your unconventional approach may catalyze the elimination of worn-out patterns. Experimentation is your secret to success. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
